data.title: Jesus Rivera waco art
data.text: Art Forum Of Waco have avbif Artist Jesus Rivera. Founder of the art forum of Waco and Helping artistin Town.

data.title: Beautiful art shows
data.text: Jesus Rivera has built a very nice art gallery with beautiful art shows. Certainly go to any openings!

data.title: Art Forum of Waco
data.text: The art forum is a true treasure in central Texas! Always leading the art movement in Waco. Various international exhibits of extraordinary  quality. Many artists in art studios available at the gallery, with unique talent, great place worth visiting

data.title: ho hum
data.text: situated in a rough neighborhood.   Quaint little building, an old house   think,  but not a real art showcase by any means, but I am sure are pieces here and there worth seeing.

data.title: An artist-led gallery and studio space
data.text: Art Forum is a house converted for use as studio and gallery space by some visionary artists. It has a changing program of art and sculpture by local artists, some of whom now have national and even international recognition for their work. There are many lovely, affordable pieces to be found here. It's a welcoming and interesting place to visit, even if you are not in the market to buy art. A great way to access Waco's growing art scene.
